fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Climate Action
eu_initiatives:
via EuroWindoor AISBL: 
Construction Product Regulation (CPR) 2011/305/EU 
Energy Performance of Buildings Directive (EPBD) 2010/31/EU 
Eco Design Directive 2009/125/EU 
Energy Labelling Framework Directive 2010/30/EU 
Chemical substances (REACH) 2006/1907/EC 
Restriction of Hazardous Substances in electrical and electronic equipment (RoHS) 2011/65/EU 
CEN and ISO-Standardisation
organisation_name: Federation of the European Building Joinery Associations (FEMIB) (FEMIB)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: FEMIB members agreed in a meeting for preparation of a new AISBL founding on March 25th, 2015 to suspend the operations of FEMIB and to participate instead to the new European Association EuroWindoor AISBL.
goals__remit:
- To represent the membership of the Federation 
- To facilitate the relations between her members 
- To take joint efforts in finding solutions for any problems encountered by the building joinery industry at economic, technical and social level 
- To promote any initiative taken in order to increase consumption of building joinery products 
- To act for the decisions taken before international organizations and to support the members to represent the decisions before their governments 
- To encourage organizations which are aimed at conducting scientific, economic or social research in the interest to the trade 
- To endeavour to settle any differences which might arise among the members 
- To support the members when formulating a national action plan for increasing consumption of wood
